name: Adventure Tim(e)
description:
2D side scrolling ‘rage’ game where the player must fight through enemies and traps to defeat the final boss. Requires the player to actively engage with the game by learning trap locations so they can avoid them next run.

Your name is TIm. Your father was an adventurer but was slain by an evil wizard. Your goal is to hunt down the wizard and avenge your father.

Shift - Jump

Z - Shoot

Up Arrow - Jump/Climb

Left/Right Arrow - Movement

Other controls can be found in the game under "Help".

Advanced mode (one-hit death) can also be enabled in the "Options" menu.

This game was made in GameMaker Studio 2. My main focus on this game was programming, I did not make most of this art.
